name: HSPC_EPSD_BENEFIT_PRDS_HX
description: This table contains audit history for Hospice Benefit Periods.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: History of the Hospice Benefit Period Start Dates.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: History of the Hospice Benefit Period End Dates.

columns.name: HSPC_BENEFIT_PRDS_COMMENT_HX
columns.description: History of the comments left on Hospice Benefit Periods.

columns.name: PERIOD_CNT
columns.description: History of the Hospice Benefit Period number.

columns.name: VCTI_DATE
columns.description: History of the Hospice Benefit Period first CTI date.

columns.name: VCTI_PROV_ID
columns.description: Histoyr of the Hospice Benefit Period first CTI provider ID.

columns.name: VCTI_RECEIVER_USER_ID
columns.description: History of the ID of the user who received the Hospice Benefit Period first CTI.

columns.name: VCTI_RECEIVER_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: History of the ID of the user who made edits to the Hospice Benefit Period data.

columns.name: EDIT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: EDIT_INST_DTTM
columns.description: History of the instants at which the Hospice Benefit Period data was edited.

columns.name: EDIT_LINE
columns.description: History of which line of the Hospice Benefit Period was edited. This is the line number found in column LINE of HH_EPSD_BEN_PRDS.

columns.name: SECOND_VCTI_DATE
columns.description: History of the Hospice Benefit Period second CTI date.

columns.name: SECOND_VCTI_PROV_ID
columns.description: History of the Hospice Benefit Period second CTI provider ID.

columns.name: SECOND_VCTI_RECEIVER_USER_ID
columns.description: History of the user ID who received Hospice Benefit Period second CTI.

columns.name: SECOND_VCTI_RECEIVER_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
